name: Robert Richardson
title: Director of Photography
bio: 3-time Oscar winner. Quentin Tarantino's primary cinematographer. Master of bold color, dynamic camera movement, and visually striking compositions. Known for innovative VFX integration and style-forward cinematography.

signature_look.description: Bold, stylized cinematography with saturated colors and dynamic camera movement. High contrast images with graphic quality. Cinematic references layered throughout. Strong geometric composition.
signature_look.key_characteristic: Visual style as narrative voice. Every shot is carefully composed and colored. Cinematography draws from cinema history.
signature_look.legendary_technique: Master of integrating VFX with practical cinematography; pioneer of stylized color for indie films at blockbuster scale

film_stock_emulation.name: Kodak Vision3 500T - Vibrant Grading
film_stock_emulation.characteristics: Saturated warm tones, bold grain, cinematic punch

technical_specialties.lighting_approach: Bold, graphic lighting with strong shadows and highlights. Color-motivated lighting. High-contrast setups. Practical effects integrated with cinematic lighting.
technical_specialties.color_science: Saturated primary colors with selective desaturation. Bold teals and oranges. Color creates mood and pacing.
technical_specialties.exposure_philosophy: Expose for style and impact. Maintain graphic quality. Crush blacks and lift shadows for cinematic punch.
technical_specialties.dynamic_range_preference: Controlled dynamic range for graphic impact
frame_rate_preference: Variable frame rates for stylistic effect

director_collaboration.communication_style: Creative, visually literate collaboration. References cinema history. Speaks in visual language and cinematic allusions.
director_collaboration.strengths_with_narrative: Elevates dialogue-heavy scenes through visual storytelling. Makes static scenes visually dynamic. Creates visual rhythm.

technical_mandates: Bold color grading with teal/orange contrast
